description: Installation of 6 Vodafone/O2 telecommunication antennas installed onto the rooftop at various locations on existing support pole. Additionally, the installtion of associated equipment cabinets located onto new steel work support grillage with ancillary development.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Design and access statement,  photographical aerial surveys, Cornerstone: Supporting technical Information booklet,  general bakground information on radio network development, site specific supplementary  information, ICNIRP letter dated 30th of November 2010, drawing number: 100, 200, 201, 300, 301, 400  & 500 (LBI REG: 26421)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
